title: Just a Headache
author: Unregistered

report: I can't pay for weed its too expensive. So I found some wormwood and some ephedra navedensis in my pasture and I brewed a tea. I drank half a cup it tasted pretty bitter one hour later nothing except a headache, I prefer ephedra alone.
